title: Poached pears in Sauternes
description: This classy dessert from Michel Roux is delicious, low in fat, and counts as one of your 5-a-day!
ingredients: 6-12 ripe pears, depending on size (preferably William or Conference)
400ml/14fl oz Sauternes, or other medium sweet white wine
1 cinnamon stick, broken into short lengths
